snippet: Malik Bendjelloul, the director of Oscar-winning documentary "Searching for Sugar Man," died on Tuesday evening in the Stockholm area, police said. He was 36....

headline.print_headline: 'Searching for Sugar Man' Director Malik Bendjelloul Dies at Age 36
headline.main: 'Searching for Sugar Man' Director Malik Bendjelloul Dies at Age 36

lead_paragraph: Malik Bendjelloul, the director of Oscar-winning documentary "Searching for Sugar Man," died on Tuesday evening in the Stockholm area, police said. He was 36.
